title: Clouds
creator_credit: Film Associates and Arthur D. Nelles
brief_description: Points out to the primary school pupil the variety of observations that can be made about clouds: their appearances, shapes and the way they build up or fade away. Illustrates also the importance of clouds as a source of water. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
